knimeNode.name: UCSC SQL
knimeNode.shortDescription: Query the UCSC MYSQL tables by genomic position

fullDescription.intro:
Append positional data from UCSC tables from the MYSQL table stored in a UCSC database . Requirement: the table containing the data should exists.
Note for IRT/nantes users: use port 3316 in the JDBC uri
fullDescription.option: JDBC uri. For the ucsc data it is: jdbc:mysql://genome-mysql.cse.ucsc.edu/hg19
JDBC user. For the ucsc data it is: "genome"
JDBC password. For the ucsc data it is empty
The UCSC table to be parsed
